value:
"One without the capacity to love has
not the capacity to be a Hero..."$k$pWho said that? Oh, um...I made it up.

What a glorious flower. I wonder
what it's called? A name as lilting as
its petals are beautiful, I'd wager.$k$pIn the future in which I was raised, I
was so focused on surviving that I
was unable to appreciate such things.

I must devise a special move befitting
the Day of Devotion. Maybe...
Love Flame! No... Heart Slash?$k$pHmm... Neither of those have that
special ring to them...

Rage on, oh hurricane of love! I will
hold true to myself, with my
indomitable soul...$k$pMother?! How long have you been
watching that?!

A true warrior of love and flowers
can wear anything well!

Hark! It is I, Owain, messenger of
love! I come to impart the undying
affection of $Nf.

My Brand...it cries out... Saying I must
express more gratitude!

Urgh. No, this is bad. Run! Before my
love covers the entire world!

No! It cannot be! Do you mean to say
I don't...have enough...love?!

Oh wow, are you sure about this?
Giving me such power... My
gratitude will go on a rampage!

Master, you called? Now that I,
Owain, have come to your aid, this
Day of Devotion is sure to succeed!$k$pI mean...I'll do my best.

All things with a form will surely fade
in time. Such is the fate of all
material phenomena...$k$pBut love! Love is everlasting! Feelings,
once woven, will ride across eternity!
In other words, love is eternal!$k$pWhy do I say this? Because I am
pierced with the arrow of love and
am feeling an outpouring of affection.$k$pIt is because of my mother's love that
I am the man I am today. One could
even say that love creates the future.$k$pYou have taken such good care of
me, in a myriad of ways. That in itself
is a form of love, is it not?$k$pSo please, take these flowers. They
aren't enough to show my gratitude,
but I shall show it fully with time!
ていっ
くらえ！
うわっ
な、なんだと…
Got a present for ya!
Behold the power of love!
Blue Flower Flurry!
Had enough yet?
Not good enough?
Hm?
Hark! I have been reborn as the warrior of love and flowers! Oh, uh... Is that how it goes? Never mind.
Hey, cut that out! I can't risk crushing these flowers.
This outfit may not suit my dark and debonair persona... Yes, that's it! This must be a trial from fate itself!
I'm working on a new move. First, I throw a bunch of petals into the air, and then, while my foe's vision is obscured, I strike! Pretty cool, huh?
I never let down my guard—not even during a festival that looks...really fun, actually. Hmph.
I want to express my gratitude to Mother today, but I just can't seem to find the right words...
You're always helping me out. I wish to show you my gratitude.
Got it.
Huh?
This won't take long.
